'''Beta 1.2.14.3''' is the second beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.4.0]], released on March 31, 2018, which fixes one bug.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004124912-Minecraft-Beta-1-2-14-3-Xbox-One-Windows-10-Android-|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.2.14.3 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Addressed players getting stuck on the loading/splash screen. (Android only)</onlyinclude>
